text: Is there any detailed documentation of internalnorm, and how to modify it? It doesn't seem to be found by search

elements.text: Is there any detailed documentation of internalnorm, and how to modify it? It doesn't seem to be found by search

text: Not sure what exactly you're looking for, but by default it uses DiffEqBase.ODE_DEFAULT_NORM, found here: <https://github.com/SciML/DiffEqBase.jl/blob/master/src/common_defaults.jl>
